Key Match Events: The Washington Wizards' strong defensive performance led to a 125-107 win against the Chicago Bulls.
Post-Match Reflections: Wizards head coach Brian Keefe was happy with how the team has grown on the defensive end, praising their defensive intensity and ability to fly around, get deflections, and cause turnovers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The win put the Wizards on the right track to start the new year, and they looked far different from the team that started the season with a 3-24 record.
Others: The Wizards will travel to the Big Easy as they take on the New Orleans Pelicans, who boast the worst record in the NBA at 5-29.
